llm_command:
kubectl apply -n frontend -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: allow-frontend-to-adservice
  namespace: frontend
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  ingress:
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: adservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 9555
EOF
